name: Treasure Island (itch) (samdeleon)
description:
Find the scattered maps, avoid dangerous traps, all to find the hidden treasure in Treasure Island. An adventure, puzzle game developed by Team JABUBU. Adventure Awaits!

Group Members:

  • Seunghwan Cho
  • Samantha de Leon
  • Johann Gonzales
  • Warren Duhaylungsod

Use of Assets:

Island Assets by Lylek Games

Stylized Pirate Asset Set - Free Pack By Stephen Bolger

Animated PBR Chest Demo By quiArt

RPG Monster Partners PBR Polyart By Dungeon Mason

Egyptian Tomb: Cat Statue By Nokobot

Stone Pillar By Giggle Star

Ancient Ruins in the desert - Part1 By NEKCOM Entertainment

Ancient Ruins in the desert - Part2 By NEKCOM Entertainment
